entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow near noon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
